EmailTemplate.name: How are you controlling indirect spends? (1561472414.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: How are you controlling indirect spends? (1561472414.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Carrie,
It’s been a few weeks since we dropped in. At Grand & Toy we know indirect spends can quickly become a challenge to control, let us help.I just spoke with Bryant this morning, and he will be taking a look at our website to see if there is anything of interest that he would like quoted. Purpose of my email today is to ask if you have a timeline to send the usage information we discussed? For a better understanding of the (thousands) of items we offer (may give you some ideas) please see a link to our website below. https://www.grandandtoy.com/ <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/]]> Please let us know if you are still interested in pursuing a business partnership with us. Best regards, Liz Rust Business Development Manager, Central Canada 200 Aviva Park Dr, Vaughan, ON L4L 9C7 E-mail: elizabethrust@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:elizabethrust@grandandtoy.com]]> | Cell: 365-778-8250 Office Supplies | Interiors & Furniture | Print & Documents | Facility Resources | Technology
